items.sentence: I suddenly remembered that I was supposed to be somewhere else.
The video Tom uploaded the day before yesterday has gone viral.
I've been having a lot more fun here in Boston than I expected.
Tom doesn't know how long he's going to have to stay in Boston.
What used to seem important to me no longer seems so important.
I'll visit you on Sunday, if I don't write you to the contrary.
Do you think that you could handle that kind of responsibility?
Tom likes the blue one as well as the red one. Mary hates both.
Almost anyone can be a good singer if they have a good teacher.
We didn't get the chance to do that while we were in Australia.
